actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of personnel in positions on the police force of Washington National Airport and the police force of Dulles International Airport.

summary.text: Includes the personnel of the police force of Washington National Airport and Dulles International Airport within the scope of the civil service retirement provisions. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of personnel in positions on the police force of Washington National Airport and the police force of Dulles International Airport.
